short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide extra information and automatic actions for RHS pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provide extra information and automatic actions for Works Applications based pages.

  - Automatically draft day hours based on gate recording or defined times for WFH
  - Automatically input drafted days
  - Display average worked hours per day and projected average for the end of the month 
  - Provide translations of some texts from Japanese to English (salary/bonus statement page)
  - UI/UX improvements
  - Reminder notifications
